messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] to me from me
messages.msgSnippet: ... I always have missing posts.  Some show up days later, some never.  I only know they are missing because other people reply to them.  It makes it a little
messages.messageBody:
> Alright, I am not getting any messages, my email box
> is a sad and lonely place. I wonder if anyone else
> is experiencing the burp in the system, I went to
> the yahoogroups site and see a boatload of messages.
> I checked my settings and they are all normal - I
> am also not getting my unschoolingdotcom mail or any
> other yahoogroups, wonder what gives.
>
> Well, if I get this hopefully things are back in
> order.
>
> sistakammi

I always have missing posts. Some show up days later,
some never. I only know they are missing because
other people reply to them. It makes it a little hard
to keep up with the discussions when there are holes
and I can't stand reading at yahoo because of the
stupid ads.

Kitrina

messages.subject: to me from me
messages.msgSnippet: Alright, I am not getting any messages, my email box is a sad and lonely place.  I wonder if anyone else is experiencing the burp in the system, I went to the
messages.messageBody:
Alright, I am not getting any messages, my email box is a sad and lonely place. I wonder if anyone else is experiencing the burp in the system, I went to the yahoogroups site and see a boatload of messages. I checked my settings and they are all normal - I am also not getting my unschoolingdotcom mail or any other yahoogroups, wonder what gives.

Well, if I get this hopefully things are back in order.

sistakammi


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
